013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
018
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023
024/**
025 * Allows adding metadata to a single tag that is used by the operation object.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * The Tag Object allows adding metadata to a single tag that is used by the Operation Object. It is not mandatory 
029 * to have a Tag Object per tag used there, but it can be useful for providing additional information about tags 
030 * such as descriptions and external documentation.
031 *
032 * <h5 class='section'>OpenAPI Specification:</h5>
033 * <p>
034 * The Tag Object is composed of the following fields:
035 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
036 *    <li><c>name</c> (string, REQUIRED) - The name of the tag
037 *    <li><c>description</c> (string) - A short description for the tag (CommonMark syntax may be used)
038 *    <li><c>externalDocs</c> ({@link ExternalDocumentation}) - Additional external documentation for this tag
039 * </ul>
040 *
041 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
042 * <p class='bcode'>
043 *    <jc>// Construct using SwaggerBuilder.</jc>
044 *    Tag <jv>x</jv> = <jsm>tag</jsm>()
045 *       .name(<js>"pet"</js>)
046 *       .description(<js>"Pets operations"</js>)
047 *
048 *    <jc>// Serialize using JsonSerializer.</jc>
049 *    String <jv>json</jv> = Json.<jsm>from</jsm>(<jv>x</jv>);
050 *
051 *    <jc>// Or just use toString() which does the same as above.</jc>
052 *    String <jv>json</jv> = <jv>x</jv>.toString();
053 * </p>
054 * <p class='bcode'>
055 *    <jc>// Output</jc>
056 *    {
057 *       <js>"name"</js>: <js>"pet"</js>,
058 *       <js>"description"</js>: <js>"Pets operations"</js>
059 *    }
060 * </p>
061 *
062 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
063 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0#tag-object">OpenAPI Specification &gt; Tag Object</a>
064 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/grouping-operations-with-tags/">OpenAPI Grouping Operations with Tags</a>
065 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
066 * </ul>
067 */
068public class Tag extends OpenApiElement {
069
070   private String
071      name,
072      description;
073   private ExternalDocumentation externalDocs;
074
075   /**
076    * Default constructor.
077    */
078   public Tag() {}
079
080   /**
081    * Copy constructor.
082    *
083    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
084    */
085   public Tag(Tag copyFrom) {
086      super(copyFrom);
087
088      this.name = copyFrom.name;
089      this.description = copyFrom.description;
090      this.externalDocs = copyFrom.externalDocs == null ? null : copyFrom.externalDocs.copy();
091   }
092
093   /**
094    * Make a deep copy of this object.
095    *
096    * @return A deep copy of this object.
097    */
098   public Tag copy() {
099      return new Tag(this);
100   }
101
102   /**
103    * Bean property getter:  <property>name</property>.
104    *
105    * <p>
106    * The name of the tag.
107    *
108    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
109    */
110   public String getName() {
111      return name;
112   }
113
114   /**
115    * Bean property setter:  <property>name</property>.
116    *
117    * <p>
118    * The name of the tag.
119    *
120    * @param value
121    *    The new value for this property.
122    *    <br>Property value is required.
123    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
124    * @return This object
125    */
126   public Tag setName(String value) {
127      name = value;
128      return this;
129   }
130
131   /**
132    * Bean property getter:  <property>description</property>.
133    *
134    * <p>
135    * A short description for the tag.
136    *
137    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
138    */
139   public String getDescription() {
140      return description;
141   }
142
143   /**
144    * Bean property setter:  <property>description</property>.
145    *
146    * <p>
147    * A short description for the tag.
148    *
149    * @param value
150    *    The new value for this property.
151    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
152    * @return This object
153    */
154   public Tag setDescription(String value) {
155      description = value;
156      return this;
157   }
158
159   /**
160    * Bean property getter:  <property>externalDocs</property>.
161    *
162    * <p>
163    * Additional external documentation for this tag.
164    *
165    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
166    */
167   public ExternalDocumentation getExternalDocs() {
168      return externalDocs;
169   }
170
171   /**
172    * Bean property setter:  <property>externalDocs</property>.
173    *
174    * <p>
175    * Additional external documentation for this tag.
176    *
177    * @param value
178    *    The new value for this property.
179    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
180    * @return This object
181    */
182   public Tag setExternalDocs(ExternalDocumentation value) {
183      externalDocs = value;
184      return this;
185   }
186
187   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
188   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
189      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
190      return switch (property) {
191         case "name" -> toType(getName(), type);
192         case "description" -> toType(getDescription(), type);
193         case "externalDocs" -> toType(getExternalDocs(), type);
194         default -> super.get(property, type);
195      };
196   }
197
198   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
199   public Tag set(String property, Object value) {
200      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
201      return switch (property) {
202         case "description" -> setDescription(Utils.s(value));
203         case "externalDocs" -> setExternalDocs(toType(value, ExternalDocumentation.class));
204         case "name" -> setName(Utils.s(value));
205         default -> {
206            super.set(property, value);
207            yield this;
208         }
209      };
210   }
211
212   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
213   public Set<String> keySet() {
214      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
215         .addIf(description != null, "description")
216         .addIf(externalDocs != null, "externalDocs")
217         .addIf(name != null, "name")
218         .build();
219      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
220   }
221
222   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
223   public Tag strict() {
224      super.strict();
225      return this;
226   }
227
228   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
229   public Tag strict(Object value) {
230      super.strict(value);
231      return this;
232   }
233
234}
